content.rendered:
Commercial and Infrastructure Projects

Explore our latest commercial and infrastructure developments, where innovation meets functionality. Discover how we create high-quality spaces that drive growth and progress.

Retardo Pluvial Tank

Description: Construction of a commercial and infrastructure project focused on designing a stormwater drainage system.
Location: San Juan, Heredia, Costa Rica
Length: 160 m // 550 ft
Duration: 6 months

Additional Images

Food Court Fidélitas

Description: Construction of a 4-story building with a basement. The first level houses a food court, the second level contains laboratories, while the third and fourth levels are open spaces. Installed systems include constant pressure, air conditioning, fire detection, internet, and security camera monitoring. An elevator was installed from level 1 to level 4. Additionally, an electrical room was built, and the entire campus power supply was upgraded. The facade features a curtain wall on the main staircases and aluminum-framed windows with natural-colored aluminum and gray glass. The project also included the construction of benches, planters, and a parking lot.
Location: Montes de Oca, San José, Costa Rica
Area: 2,500 m² // 27,000 ft²
Duration: 15 months

Additional Images

Pool Remodeling

Description: Pool renovation featuring a washed plaster finish with special Marquis Charcoal plaster for the pool floor and Natural color for pool entrances and wet bar. Fine sandblasted Tempisque marble flooring was installed, and showers were clad with green Tikal marble in a 10×10 cm format.
Location: Conchal, Guanacaste, Costa Rica
Area: 70 m² // 755 ft²
Duration: 3 months

Additional Images

Marina Flamingo Remodeling

Description: Office renovation including electrical, mechanical, and air conditioning systems, fire detection and suppression, and burglary alarm system. Features wooden ceilings and laminated flooring.
Location: Marina Flamingo, Guanacaste, Costa Rica
Area: 75 m² // 810 ft²
Duration: 3 months

Additional Images

Kitty Storage Warehouse

Description: Construction of a storage warehouse and dining area. Built with masonry blocks and concrete elements, featuring a metal structure covered with tray-type panels on all walls, fine plaster finishes, and paint. The roof includes metal trusses, fasteners, and insulated zinc sheets. Equipped with 12 loading docks and 3 hydraulic docks. The two-level dining area and bathrooms are also built with masonry blocks, featuring aluminum windows, metal doors, porcelain tile flooring, and an enameled rectangular sheet roof.
Location: Llano Grande, Cartago, Costa Rica
Area: 8,000 m² // 86,100 ft²
Duration: 8 months

Additional Images

Flex Center

Description: Warehouse construction with interior gypsum partitions and flat gypsum ceilings. Includes a metal staircase railing, bathroom installations, exposed EMT electrical system, polished concrete floors, black European-style windows, air conditioning installation, and white aluminum baseboards.
Location: Escazú, San José, Costa Rica
Area: 600 m² // 6,500 ft²
Duration: 3 months

Additional Images

Lounge Remodeling

Description: Lounge renovation including electrical system upgrades and a new air conditioning system. Features Saltillo tile flooring, restored wooden doors, Goltex interior paint, and acrylic stucco exterior finishes.
Location: Las Catalinas, Guanacaste, Costa Rica
Area: 60 m² // 650 ft²
Duration: 2 months

Additional Images

Centro Diurno Remodeling

Description: Renovation of the Day Center, including bathroom areas and masonry walls with fine plaster and paint finishes. Upgrades include lightweight ceilings, matte porcelain tile flooring (60×60 cm), concrete sink furniture with matte porcelain cladding (30×60 cm), and wooden doors.
Location: Santa Bárbara, Heredia, Costa Rica
Area: 200 m² // 2,150 ft²
Duration: 6 months

Additional Images

Printer Contimaca Offices Remodeling

Description: Office renovation using lightweight construction elements. Includes electrical, mechanical, fire suppression and detection, security alarm, and access control systems. Finishes include polished concrete flooring, suspended ceilings, and wall plastering and painting.
Location: Escazú, San José, Costa Rica
Area: 1,200 m² // 12,900 ft²
Duration: 4 months

Additional Images

Craisa Offices Remodeling

Description: Renovation of administrative offices, including electrical system upgrades, roof covering replacement, structural reinforcement, earthworks, and metal roofing for parking areas with solar panels. The project also included asphalt paving for parking lots and the access road.
Location: San Francisco, Heredia, Costa Rica
Area: 1,100 m² // 11,900 ft²
Duration: 10 months
Completion: January 2019

Additional Images

Zurquí Stables

Description: Construction of a stable using masonry and concrete elements. Includes electrical and mechanical systems, a metal roof structure with a rectangular covering, and fine plaster wall finishes. Features metal doors with teak wood slats and a cantilevered PVC deck.
Location: San Isidro, Heredia, Costa Rica
Area: 120 m² // 1,290 ft²
Duration: 5 months

Additional Images

Zurquí Stables Access Street

Description: Construction of an access road, including land grading, asphalt paving, public lighting with metal poles, and overhead illumination.
Location: San Isidro, Heredia, Costa Rica
Area: 900 m² // 9,690 ft²
Duration: 3 months

Additional Images

SKY Conference Room

Description: Construction of a conference room using masonry blocks and concrete elements. Includes electrical and mechanical systems, with finishes in porcelain tile flooring, iron doors, and aluminum windows.
Location: Río Segundo, Alajuela, Costa Rica
Area: 160 m² // 1,700 ft²
Duration: 4 months

Additional Images

SKY Gabion Wall

Description: Construction of a gabion wall.
Location: Río Segundo, Alajuela, Costa Rica
Area: 500 m² // 5,400 ft²
Duration: 4 months

Additional Images

San Juan Community Center

Description: Construction of a community hall using masonry blocks and reinforced concrete, with a metal roof structure and galvanized corrugated sheet covering. Features plastered walls, aluminum windows, wooden and metal doors, porcelain tile flooring, and porcelain cladding. Includes electrical, fire detection, mechanical, and drainage systems.
Location: Santa Bárbara, Heredia, Costa Rica
Area: 170 m² // 1,830 ft²
Duration: 6 months
Completion: August 2020

Additional Images

Fidélitas University San Pedro

Description: Construction of a 4-story university building with reinforced concrete elements and a metal structure. Includes reinforced concrete slab floors, porcelain tile flooring and cladding, aluminum windows, wooden doors, aluminum composite facades, and tempered glass. The project also included asphalt parking lots, an access road, and a gated entrance.
Location: Montes de Oca, San Pedro, Costa Rica
Area: 1,780 m² // 19,160 ft²
Duration: 13 months
Completion: December 2019

Additional Images

Radio and Television Station

Description: Construction of a radio and television studio using reinforced concrete and metal frames, with a metal roof structure and enameled sheet covering. Features lightweight drywall cladding, aluminum windows, porcelain tile flooring, aluminum blinds, electrical and sound systems, thermo-acoustic insulation, and high-quality mechanical systems.
Location: Montes de Oca, San José, Costa Rica
Area: 310 m² // 3,340 ft²
Duration: 7 months

Additional Images

University Facade Renovation

Description: Renovation of the university facade.
Location: Montes de Oca, San José, Costa Rica
Area: 150 m² // 1,620 ft²
Duration: 3 months

Additional Images

Fidepark University Park

Description: Construction of a university park featuring concrete pathways and sidewalks, a multi-purpose court with a carbon fiber slab, bleachers, and fencing. Includes picnic tables made of recycled plastic, light posts, and a covered walkway connecting the university to the park.
Location: Montes de Oca, San José, Costa Rica
Area: 980 m² // 10,550 ft²
Duration: 4 months

Additional Images

Fidélitas University Heredia

Description: Construction of a 5-story university building with reinforced concrete and metal frame structure. Includes concrete slab floors, porcelain tile flooring and cladding, aluminum windows, wooden doors, and aluminum composite facades. The project also involved asphalt parking lots, landscaping, and the construction of a reinforced concrete amphitheater with a ceramic mural.
Location: San Francisco, Heredia, Costa Rica
Area: 4,550 m² // 49,000 ft²
Duration: 17 months
Completion: December 2019

Additional Images

RJM Abogados Office Renovation

Description: Office renovation using lightweight construction elements. Includes fire detection and suppression systems, burglary alarm, aluminum doors, and wall plastering and painting.
Location: San Francisco, Heredia, Costa Rica
Area: 190 m² // 2,050 ft²
Duration: 3 months

Additional Images

Craisa Civil Works

Description: Construction of civil works, including gabion walls for land leveling. The project also involved land cutting and filling for machinery exhibition and the construction of a metal structure with a zinc sheet roof.
Location: San Francisco, Heredia, Costa Rica
Area: 1,100 m² // 11,850 ft²
Duration: 5 months

Additional Images

Guachipelín Walls

Description: Construction of gabion walls, prefabricated walls, concrete walls, and sidewalks.
Location: Escazú, San José, Costa Rica
Area: 120 m² // 1,300 ft²
Duration: 3 months

Additional Images

San José Commercial Spaces

Description: Construction of five commercial spaces using reinforced concrete and metal frames, with a metal roof structure and enameled covering. Features aluminum shutters and windows, porcelain tile and polished concrete flooring, and wooden and metal doors.
Location: Merced, San José, Costa Rica
Area: 1,250 m² // 13,500 ft²
Duration: 10 months
Completion: December 2017

Additional Images
